entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Snow level 1100 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
